select TOP ${limit} A.detailID,A.sampleBatchID,P.clinicID,P.rxCount,P.clinicDate,P.serialNo,P.diagnosis,P.drugNum,P.antiNum,P.injectionNum,P.baseDrugNum,P.publish, P.money, P.rational,P.age,P.patientName, P.disItem ,P.department, P.isWestern western,P.doctorName, P.confirmName,P.apothecaryName, P.reviewDate,substring(P.clinicType,1,1) clinicType from (select * from SampleList) A left join Clinic P on P.clinicID = A.objectID
where A.detailID < ( select min(detailID) from (select top ${start} detailID from SampleList

order by A.detailID desc

order by detailID desc ) A)
